<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Vanth's Weapon Expertise](/Feats.aspx?ID=2364) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Duskwalker" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=257" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 31 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Vanth's Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=2357)

</column>

---

[Vanths](/Monsters.aspx?ID=769) themselves recognize you as an honorary reaper. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in [bo staves](/Weapons.aspx?ID=17), [longbows](/Weapons.aspx?ID=76), [composite longbows](/Weapons.aspx?ID=76), [scythes](/Weapons.aspx?ID=39), and [staves](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12).
name: Vanth's Weapon Expertise
